title: Update premium pricing cadence to $5 every 9 weeks

requirements.text: Update all user-facing premium pricing copy to state that Premium Report Cards cost $5 billed every 9 weeks (replace any existing “every 3 months” / “/ 3 months” messaging wherever it appears).

quotes: update the pricing to every 9 weeks at $5

acceptanceCriteria: The premium upsell banner copy says "$5 every 9 weeks" (and does not mention "3 months").
The Report Cards upgrade screen shows "$5 / 9 weeks" (or equivalent clear English) instead of "$5 / 3 months".
No other frontend screens mention the old premium billing cadence ("3 months").

requirements.text: Update the checkout line-item metadata sent to the backend so that the product description reflects a 9-week access period at $5 (e.g., replace “3 months access to report card features” with “9 weeks access to report card features”).

quotes: update the pricing to every 9 weeks at $5

acceptanceCriteria: When starting checkout, the item description reflects “9 weeks” rather than “3 months”.

requirements.text: Update the backend premium access duration so that newly granted/purchased premium access lasts 9 weeks (instead of the current ~3-month duration), while keeping the price at 500 cents.

quotes: update the pricing to every 9 weeks at $5

acceptanceCriteria: Backend constant(s) controlling premium access duration are updated so new premium access expires 9 weeks after it is granted.
Existing premium access records are not invalidated or modified; only future grants/purchases use the new 9-week duration.

requirements.text: Update any backend-provided premium price strings shown in preview/onboarding data (e.g., App Store preview / onboarding guide premium sections) so they describe $5 every 9 weeks in clear English.

quotes: update the pricing to every 9 weeks at $5

acceptanceCriteria: Any premium price text fields returned by backend preview/onboarding APIs mention “$5 every 9 weeks” and do not mention “3 months”.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not modify any files listed as immutable by SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Backend must remain a single-actor Motoko canister; keep all logic in backend/main.mo and only add backend/migration.mo if a state migration is strictly necessary.
nonGoals: Do not change the premium price amount (it remains $5 / 500 cents).
Do not add new payment providers or authentication methods.
Do not redesign the premium feature set; only update pricing cadence and related text/duration.
